overview: Years after the events of The Dose (2020), Bones and his friends try to move on with their lives after graduating High School. Their peacefulness comes to an end with the emergence of a masked killer, igniting a discovery of secrets and lies. Along the way to uncover the identity of the killer, Bones and the group find a much bigger web of unexplained mysteries that may all connect to their past. Only then does the true nightmare begin...
title: The Mystery Saga
